reviewText: Learned a lot about this time period.  The speaker, the gentleman who was captured, was tortured.  He seems relaxed, but he has a hard time talking about the terrible details.  Teachers like that the film is short.  Hoping to show support to anyone trying to keep the memory of those "difficult to talk about times" in our history.

I hate to give this 2 stars, for I have awesome respect for these guys, and what they endured for us! Still, the DVD was quite short and overpriced for what it contained. The worst part was the fellow who spoke of his hell he endured. I could understand very little of what he had to say, and that ruined the whole thing for me.
